description: This file is an Angular application configuration file, defining the app's providers and routing setup.

methods.name: provideZoneChangeDetection
methods.description: Enables zone change detection with event coalescing for performance optimization.

methods.name: provideRouter
methods.description: Sets up routing for the Angular application with specified routes.

methods.name: provideClientHydration
methods.description: Enables hydration for server-side rendering with event replay support.

methods.name: withEventReplay
methods.description: Configures event replay behavior for hydration process.
